definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be high, exalted, rise (OHeb., Ph., OAram., Palm., all in n. pr.; Sab. in [[רים]] epith. dei et regis Fell:ZMG liv (1900), 25 f. also in n. pr. Mordtm:ib. xxx (1876), 36 SabDenkm No. 14, 1. 1; Ar. r0m be high, dial. of Oman (Jayakar:JA xxi. 813, 875) and Zanzibar (Prä:ZMG xxxiv (1880), 218); Eth. in deriv.; Aram. [[רָם]], rwm (very often in der. spec. and deriv.));—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: be high, lit. rock (in fig.) Ps 61:3 ([[מִן]] comp.); be (set on) high, [[רָָמּוּ]] Job 22:12 (of stars), esp. pt., = adj., in gen. Is 2:12 (+ [[גֵּאֶה]]), of mts. v:Is 2:14, De 12:2, hill Ez Eze 6:13, Eze 20:28, Eze 34:6, throne Is 6:1, trees = tall Is 2:13, Ez Eze 17:22, cf. (in fig.) Is 10:33 ([[רָמֵי הַקוֹמָה]]); human stature De 1:28 ([[מִן]] comp.), De 2:10, De 2:21, De 9:2; [[רָמִים]] Ps 78:69 heights (of heaven; ‖[[אֶרֶץ ]]); [[רָמִים]] of inhab. of heavens Job 21:22.
be raised, uplifted:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of highway Is 49:11 (made high, put in order); voice, De 27:14 (pt. = adj.) uplifted.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig.: of hand, symbol of might, De 32:27, + [[עַל]] pers. Mic 5:8; of Isr. in Exodus [[בְּיׇד רָמָה]] Ex 14:8, Nu 33:3 (both P); of ´[[י]]:’s hand Is 26:11, Ps 89:14 (‖[[תָּעׂז ]]); fig. of presumption Nu 15:30 (P); [[זְרוֹעַ רָמָה]] of might Job 38:15; of eyes, fig. of arrogance Pr 6:17, Pr 30:13, Ps 131:1 (‖[[גׇּבַהּ לִבִּי ]]), so Ps 18:28, but ‖ 2Sa 22:28 of pers.; of heart, fig. of reckless elation, Ho 13:6, De 8:14, Ez Eze 31:10 ([[בְּגׇבְהוֹ]], [[בְּקוֹמָה גׇּבַהְתָּ]]) Da 11:12, + [[מִן]] pers. De 17:20; of horn, fig. of triumph 1Sa 2:1 (song), Ps 89:25 (v:Ps 89:18 see

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ), Ps 112:9, so head Ps 27:6 (+ [[עַל]] pers.), Ps 140:9 (join [[ירומו]] to v:Ps 89:10, but read [[יׇרִימוּ]] Che, cf. Hup-Now).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of pers., be exalted (in fig.), king Nu 24:7 (JE; + [[מִן]] comp.; ‖[[תִּנַּשֵּׂא ]]); of God (´[[י]]:, i.e. shew his exaltation) Is 30:18, 2Sa 22:47 = Ps 18:47, Ps 21:14, Ps 46:11; Ps 46:11, + [[שָּׁמַיִם]]([[הַ]])[[עַל־]] Ps 57:6, Ps 57:12, Ps 108:6; ´[[עֶבֶד י]]: Is 52:13, ´[[י]]:’s people Ps 89:17; rebellious Ps 66:7 (Qr; Kt Hiph.: shew exaltation); worthlessness (personif.) Ps 12:9; of city Pr 11:11.
be lifted, rise, of ark, [[מֵעַל־הארץ]] Ge 7:17 (J), so of cherubim Ez Eze 10:16, cf. v:Eze 10:17; ´[[כְּבוֹד י]]: v:Eze 10:4 ([[מֵעַל הַכְּרוּב]]).—Pr 24:7 v. I. [[רָאמוֹת]] p. 910 b.

definitions.title: Pō‘lēl
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. sf. [[רׂמְמָָתְהוּ]] Ez Eze 31:4; 1 s. [[רוֹמַמְתִּי]] Is 1:2, Is 23:4; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְרוֹמֵם]] Ho 11:7, sf. [[יְרוֹמְמֵנִי]] Ps 27:5, [[וִירוֹמִמְךָ]] Ps 37:34; 1 s. sf. [[וַאֲרׂמְמֶ֫נְהוּ]] Ex 15:2 (Ges:§ 58 i), etc. ([[אֵרוֹמָם]] v.

definitions.title: Hithpō‘l.
definitions.body: ); Imv. mpl. [[רוֹמְמוּ]] Ps 99:5, Ps 99:9; Inf. cstr. [[לְרוֹמֵם]] Ezr 9:9; Pt. [[מְרוֹמֵם]] 1Sa 2:7, sf. [[מְרוֹמְמִי]] Ps 9:14, f. [[רוֹמֵמָה]] Ps 118:16 ([[מ]] om., Hup-Now Bae; cf. Kö:i. 454);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: raise, rear, children Is 1:2, Is 23:4 (both ‖[[גִּדֵּל ]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cause tree to grow, subj. [[תְּהוֹם]] Ez Eze 31:4 (‖[[גִּדֵּל ]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: rear, erect, temple Ezr 9:9.
lift up:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in fig., acc. pers., subj. ´[[י]]: Ps 27:5 (+ [[בְּחוּר]]); + [[מִן]] comp. 2Sa 22:49 = Ps 18:49, + [[מִן]] from Ps 9:14; acc. om. Ho 11:7 (si vera l., cf. We Now).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: raise waves of sea, subj. wind, Ps 107:25.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: exalt, acc. pers., subj. ´[[י]]: Job 17:4 (read perh. [[תְּרִמֵם]], so Bu, cf. Di), Ps 37:34 (+ [[לָרֶשֶׁת אָָרֶץ]]); acc. om. 1Sa 2:7, Ps 118:16 (in victory); subj. wisdom, acc. pers. Pr 4:8, cf. [[חְדָקָה]] [[תְּרוֹמֵם־גּוֹי]] Pr 14:34.

definitions.title: Poō‘lal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fpl. [[תְּרוֹמַמְנׇה]] Ps 75:11 be lifted up, of horns (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 2 b
definitions.body: ); Pf. 3 ms. [[וְרוֹמַם]] Ps 66:17 and he was extolled (so Ki al.; but v. [[רוֹמָם]] infr.); Pt. [[מְרוֹמַם]] Ne 9:5 extolled, of ´[[י]]:’s name (cf.

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: (I) raise, lift, c. acc., hand Ex 17:11 (E), Nu 20:11 (P), + ´[[אֶל־י]]: (in both) Ge 14:22 cf. ([[אֶל־הַשָּׁמַיִם]]) Da 12:7, + [[ב]] pers. against 1Ki 11:26, 11:27; feet, [[פְּעָמִים]] Ps 74:3, i.e. run (+ [[ל]] dir.); hand or foot Ge 41:44 (E), i.e. make any movement (hyperb.); head Ps 110:7 (As. ullû rêšu Dl:HWB 62 a), cf. [[יׇרִימוּ]] Ps 140:9 (so rd., v.

definitions.title: Qal 2 b
definitions.body: ); face, ´[[אֶל־י]]: Ezr 9:6; hand of another, subj. ´[[י]]:, fig. of giving strength to, Ps 89:43, so head Ps 3:4; c. acc. of rod Is 10:15, Ex 14:16 (P), [[הֵרִים]] [[בַּמַּטֶה]] Ex 7:20 (E); rod subj., c. acc. rei Is 10:15. (2) raise poor [[אֶבְיוֹן]], c. [[מִן]] loc. 1Sa 2:8, Ps 113:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: lilft up voilce Ge 39:15, Ge 39:18 (J; both + [[קָרָא]]), Is 40:9, Is 40:9 (acc. om.), Is 58:1, Ezr 3:12; + [[בִּתְרוּעָה]] Ez Eze 21:27, [[בַּחֲחׂחְרוֹת]] 2Ch 5:13; + [[ל]] pers. Is 13:2, [[לָעָב]] Job 38:84, + [[עָל]] pers. against 2Ki 19:22 = Is 37:23; [[הֵרִים בְּקוֹל]] 1Ch 15:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: (take into one’s hand and) lift, take up, stone Jos 4:5 (JE; [[עַל־שִׁכְמוֹ]]), leg (of sacrif. meal) 1Sa 9:24, mantle 2Ki 2:13, axe 2Ki 6:7 (acc.om.), yoke Ho 11:4 ([[עַל־לְחֵיהֶם]]), censers Nu 17:2 (P; + [[מִבֵּין]]), ashes Le 6:3.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: set up, erect, stone as [[מַצֵּבָה]] Ge 31:45 (E); standard, + [[אֶל]] of people Is 49:22, [[עַל]] Is 62:10.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: set on high, throne, [[מִמַּעַל לְכוֹכְבֵי אֵל]] Is 14:13; nest (subj. [[נֶשֶׁר]]) Job 39:27.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: lilft up, exalt, c. acc. pers., subj. ´[[י]]: 1Ki 14:7, 1Ki 16:2, Ps 89:20 (all c. [[מִן]]), Ps 75:8 (opp. [[יַשְׁפִּיל]]); subj. [[קָלוֹן]] Pr 3:35, cf. Pr 14:29; c. acc. [[קֶרֶן]], in both good and bad sense (cf.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ), Ps 92:11, Ps 148:14, Ps 75:5, Ps 75:6; but 1Ch 25:5 sound the horn; inf. = exaltation Ps 75:7, Ps 66:7 v.

definitions.title: Qal 2 c. 2.
definitions.body: lift up and take away, remove, c. acc. [[הָעֲטָרָה]] Ez Eze 21:31 (‖[[הֵסִיר ]]); acc. rei + [[מִן]] loc. Is 57:14, Le 2:9, Le 4:8, Le 4:19, Le 6:8; = do away with, [[גְּרֻשׁׂתֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 45:9 ([[מֵעַל]] of people), [[הַתָּמִיד]] Da 8:11 (Kt; Qr

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: ); = set apart, [[מֶכֶס]] Nu 31:28 ([[מִן]] pers.).
lift off and present, contributes offer:

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: contribute, acc. rei, [[ל]] pers. (for sacrif.), 2Ch 30:24, 2Ch 30:24, 2Ch 35:7, 2Ch 35:8 (acc. om.), v:2Ch 35:9.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הוּרָָם]] Ex 29:27, [[הֻרַם]] Da 8:11 Qr (Kt

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ); Impf. 3 ms. [[יוּרָם]] Le 4:10;—be taken off from ([[מִן]]) Le 4:10 (P), cf. Ex 29:27 (P; ‖[[הוּנַף ]]); be abolished Da 8:11 Qr (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph. 2
definitions.body: ); Bev (after LXX) ins. Pt. [[מוּרָם]] after [[הַתָּמִיד]] v:Da 8:13.

definitions.title: Hithpō‘l.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וְיִתְרוֹמֵם וְיִתְגַּדֵּל עַל־כָּל־אֵל]] Da 11:36 and he shall exalt and magnify himself above, etc.; 1 s. ([[ת]] assim.) [[אֵרוֹêָמם]] Is 33:10 (Ges:§ 54 c Kö:i. 454) I will raise myself (+ [[אָקוּם]], [[אֶנׇּשֵׂא]]).
